name: Rhodeia
desc: The most renowned and strongest of Lochfolk scouts. She fled Fontaine after the death of the previous Hydro Archon and settled in Qingce Village.

value.name: Oceanid
value.desc:
A life-form created from condensed Hydro elements of incredible purity. Often attached to bodies of water.
It is said that as water bodies become purer, the Hydro elements within grow more abundant, causing the Oceanids to grow more powerful. It is also said by some that Oceanids were once sea creatures from a home far away who carried the fragments of a long-dead god to the many corners of this world. Perhaps they did this so that the love their god held for this world could be spread through the waters to all the land...

value.name: Rhodeia of Loch
value.desc:
"Lady of Clear Waters" Rhodeia

"As long as rain falls and rivers flow… water will exist forever…"

customize.text: During the reign of the previous Hydro Archon Egeria, the Oceanids were spies of the Archon who were sent into rivers and seas throughout Teyvat to unite everyone in the world, in much the same way as all water is connected. Oceanids are created from condensed Hydro elements of incredible purity. It is said that as water bodies, to which Oceanids attached, become purer, the Hydro elements within grow more abundant, causing the Oceanids to grow more powerful.

When Egeria died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago, and Focalors became the new Hydro Archon, the Oceanids did not accept her rule and left Fontaine. Rhodeia, who was the most renowned and strongest of Lochfolk scouts, desired only to keep the dreams of yesteryear alive. She wanted a small haven of tranquil waters, so she settled in Qingce Village. Rhodeia has tremendous wisdom and compassion and can create Oceanid creatures. It is believed that she’s so powerful that she is able to mimic a human.
When Rhodeia first sensed the presence of another Oceanid Endora, she believed Endora to be an assassin from Fontaine, and so she stretched forth her enmity, which turned the water bitter, in order to slay the little Oceanid. Rhodeia sent her scouts, water animals, to observe Endora, and the latter was able to join with them to learn about Rhodeia's plans. When Endora finally explained that she meant no harm, Rhodeia made the water sweet again and asked Endora to join together with the waters of Qingce.
<color=#ffd780>Related Entries:</color>

customize.name: Oceanids
customize.desc: Oceanids are intelligent Hydro lifeforms created by the previous Hydro Archon, Egeria, and are able to manipulate water at will. All the people of Fontaine were once Oceanids, whom Egeria had turned into humans to satisfy their wishes, going against the will of the Heavenly Principles.

customize.name: Egeria
customize.desc: The previous Hydro Archon who died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago.

customize.name: Focalors
customize.desc: The last Hydro Archon and the God of Justice. She sacrificed herself in order to destroy the Hydro Archon's Divine Throne and restore power to the Hydro Dragon.

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

customize.name: Endora
customize.desc: Just a very curious Lochfolk who only wishes to see the world. Might actually get along very well with Mini Seelie: Dayflower, but please do not meld them together, thank you.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>April 7, 2021</color>
During this event, Travelers can equip Inquisitive Endora to capture Oceanid Creatures in designated areas and increase area exploration progress. Complete quests to earn the commemorative event gadget Endora, Hearts of the Spring, Primogems, and other rewards. After successfully completing a challenge in "Rhodeia's Rage," you can use a Heart of the Spring or Original Resin to get Character EXP Material and other rewards.

<color=#ffd780>April 8, 2021</color>
With no warning, the water sources on the border between Mondstadt and Liyue have turned bitter. Could this spell the end of Mondstadt's wine industry?
During this event, Travelers can equip Inquisitive Endora to capture Oceanid Creatures in designated areas. Increase area exploration progress and complete quests to earn rewards including the commemorative Gadget "Endora," Hearts of the Spring, and Primogems. After completing the event challenge "Rhodeia's Rage," Travelers can use either a Heart of the Spring or Original Resin to obtain Character EXP Materials and other rewards.

customize.name: Egeria
customize.desc: The previous Hydro Archon who died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago.

customize.name: Idyia
customize.desc: An event-exclusive NPC. She is an Oceanid and the caretaker of the "Bottleland," Veluriyam Mirage.

customize.name: Callirhoe
customize.desc: Callirhoe, also known as Spring Fairy, is an Oceanid who left Fontaine after the previous Archon's death and settled in Springvale.

customize.name: Lyris
customize.desc: The Director of the Narzissenkreuz Institute, an orphanage in Fontaine, she later became a member of the Narzissenkreuz Ordo and gained the title of "Red Empress" after the Institute was abandoned during the Cataclysm.

customize.name: Cleansing Heart
customize.desc:
A palmful of eternal water left by an oceanid.
Though it has already diffused among the depths of the lake, its purity remains all the same. But why would a creature so pure and clean as an oceanid covet the appearance of a being that roams the land, and assume such a form with pure water? They need not breathe nor do they require sustenance...
